page.title: 02Stebbing church
page.content: The church was originally built in 1324.We think the church was burned down before that,because a burnt coin,dating from the reign of Richard the Lion Heart and some burnt stone were found. In Stebbing church there is a {stone {screen.}There are only {three in the {world. }The other two are at Great Bardfield and Trondheim in Norway.It separates the nave and the choir. Priests used to have a bridge across the nave and there are steps in the wall of the church where it was.There is a 200 year old clock with only one hand. There are two Black Death graves in the church yard,dated 1635 and 1678. Only one stained glass window survived the vandalism of the Round- heads during the Civil War.
